text: The "Leishemlon" (), also spelt as the "Leishemlol", "Leisemlol" or "Leisemlon" (literally,"Story of the creation of the universe"), is an ancient Meitei religious text, about the cosmology and the mythology of the creation of the universe. The text gives a good picture of the cosmological religio- cultural system of the Meitei religion. ==Related pages== * Sanamahi Kachin ==Sources== * * * ==References== Category:Puya Category:Religion in India
title: Leishemlon
